footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Layla | Update Date: 11/24/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Key of Khaj-Nisut__
Best support option for Layla as it significantly improves her shield with its HP main stat and supports the team via Mastery buffs. Can be tricky to trigger since Key cannot build stacks off-field requiring Layla to be on-field when her stars fire off to trigger the team buff.

__Primordial Jade Cutter__
Great weapon for Layla assuming you're building into her Dmg. Can easily take care of Layla's Crit Rate needs by itself while also giving her a bit more HP.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Festering Desire, Favonius Sword__
Help with Recharge, Festering also helps a bit with dmg but both would mostly benefit due to the Recharge main stat. 

__Harbinger of Dawn__
Budget choice but offers solid help to Layla since her Dmg all scales off HP meaning the low Atk will not matter at all.
